to.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --layout $(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --spaces --space | jq -r 'if .type == "bsp" then "float" else "bsp" end')

/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --create && index="$(/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m query --spaces --display | /opt/homebrew/bin/jq 'map(select(."is-native-fullscreen" == false))[-1].index')" && /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --space "${index}" && /opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus "${index}"

rules.description: a-layer for hjkl movement + tab + page down/up
